active_incidents.title: Some people appear to be on a huddle after ending call.

notes.body: Some people may appear to still be on a Huddle even after leaving the call. Weâ€™re investigating the issue and will be back with an update shortly. Thank you for your patience.

active_incidents.title: Some customers missing messages from DMs and private channels

notes.body: Some of our customers are missing messages from DMs and private channels. We're currently investigating, and we'll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. We're sorry for the disruption.
